subject: Re: [BLISS] New Project Queries
preview: Thanks Heath! That makes perfect sense and makes this a reasonable workaround for us for the time being.  Overall we're in good shape now. We'll take this next week or so to do a final sweep and test

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath! That makes perfect sense and makes this a reasonable workaround for us for the time being.

Overall we're in good shape now. We'll take this next week or so to do a final sweep and test everything, and see if there are any further little niggles to iron out.

Appreciate your support!

Casey
BLISS SUPPORT

e. support@tarabliss.com.au
w. tarabliss.com.au

Courage | Creation | Collaborative Leadership

doTERRA Presidential Diamond | Author | 'Rebels of Light'

Hi Casey, 

Thanks for getting back to me, in response to your questions/updates:

  • IG - looks like it's sorted
  • Cart - great! 
  • Update billing etc - That's entirely up to you... I the users won't need that section then yes, we can hide it. 

Regarding the other question, I found it in spam! Sorry!

Sounds like that could work. We can filter out the posts that you don't want to show in the generic area. Just assign them to a common category and then we can code it along the lines of IF categoryxyz THEN don't show HERE.

Hope that makes sense?

Thank you Heath!
  • IG - this is great, thank you. Are we able to hide the handle and icon above the grid, and the 'show more' below it?
  • Cart - looks awesome, thank you. it loaded with just one quantity first time which is good news.
  • Update Billing ETC - We have the profile in the drop down once logged in (screenshot of dropdown attached) would this new account page make that profile page obsolete? https://tarabliss.com.au/members/profile/
As for the other matter about the discussion feature, I sent an email on Monday at 1:04PM. Perhaps it got lost in the thread? Casey BLISS SUPPORT e. support@tarabliss.com.au w. tarabliss.com.au Courage | Creation | Collaborative Leadership doTERRA Presidential Diamond | Author | 'Rebels of Light'

Hi Casey, 

Ok  we have made the updates, here are the links:

  • Instagram: https://tarabliss.com.au/about/  
  • Cart x3 issue: It sounds like you may already have some products in your cart. Can I ask  you to please go to: https://tarabliss.com.au/cart/ then empty your cart , then add the product again - let me know if this works?  
  • Update billing etc: They can head to the My Account page, which is here: https://tarabliss.com.au/my-account/ where would  you like us to link to this page from? Note, the payment gateway is in test mode, so you can buy the product to see how it's added in the My Account section. Just use the testing credit card number specified on the checkout page. 
Sorry I'm not sure what you mean with: "Also - can you please comment on the fix for the discussion issue we sent through yesterday?" I don't think we received this?

Hi Heath,

Thanks for this.

Insta - About page, click down to 'Deepening the Friendship' (screenshot attached). Showing a big blank white space where there should be a grid of 9 images (both Chrome and Safari)

For the cart - thank you! Just wondering if this will always load with a quantity of 3 when someone clicks through. It's done that every time I've clicked on it, just making sure people don't see $297 as the price. Also, could we change the font to mostly a freight style bar the main headings? Having everything in the font that it is is a bit much for the eyes.

With this - how would people then change their billing details/manage their subscription after the fact? I am looking on the 'my profile' page and only seeing the basics. Could we update that to have billing details and also a change password option?

Also - can you please comment on the fix for the discussion issue we sent through yesterday?

Cheers!

Casey
BLISS SUPPORT

e. support@tarabliss.com.au
w. tarabliss.com.au

Courage | Creation | Collaborative Leadership

doTERRA Presidential Diamond | Author | 'Rebels of Light'

Hi Emma and Casey, 

Emma to answer your questions:

  • WooCommerce is ready to go, if you head to https://tarabliss.com.au/?post_type=product&p=14425&preview=true (you will need to be logged in). You will be use the cart and checkout. 
  • Campfire page, we have centred the pricing block, I'm assuming that was the culprit? Note, if you also click the Join Now button, it will automatically add the product and take you to the cart as planned. 
  • Regarding the gifting subscriptions, you could give it a go. If it doesn't work, they will generally refund you. As it's still on the WooCommerce site, it *should* be ok. 
  • Regarding the redirection to a specific thank you page, yes, this is possible. If you send us the page, we can code it in.
Casey, thanks for adding the Insta credentials. We are struggling to find where to load the instagram feed. Can you please let me know? It looks like maybe on the About Us page, but we couldn't find it exactly.

Hi Heath, I hope you are well and possibly enjoyed a picnic this weekend! Would you be able to help me with some timelines and questions, please?
  • When do you think the woocommerce store will be ready to go? Meaning it is styled like the current one, able to be loaded with projects and subscriptions are working?
  • The Campfire page is almost ready to rumble we're just having some issues with the block at the bottom. Ideally it would be centered, can you please take a look for us?
  • We've been having a look at the possibility of "gifting" subscriptions but the reviews on this doesn't look ideal.. but it's 2 years old... thoughts? Do you have experience with this and if we did install it, would we treat it any differently in active campaign? And finally, how long would it push the tech side of the site from being ready?
  • Also one final question, when someone has purchased the campfire, we want redirect them to a specific campfire thank you page, is that all possible?
Thanks Heath, looking forward to hearing from you. Em

Hey Heath

Thanks for that - I've connected the feed.

Casey
BLISS SUPPORT

doTERRA Presidential Diamond | Author | 'Rebels of Light'

Hi Casey, 

Week is going well, hope yours is too. Ok regarding Insta feed:

  1. Can you make sure you are logged in to Insta with your desktop browser, 
  2. Click this link: https://tarabliss.com.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=sb-instagram-feed
  3. Press the big blue button "Connect an Instagram Account"
  4. Follow the prompts to authorise 
  5. Let us know and we will take it from there 
Regarding PayPal subscriptions, I'm not 100% sure, but, they do tend to have feature like that. We can setup and test I guess?

Hi Heath,

How is your week faring?

I'm just checking in as I had a thought re: PayPal and subscriptions.

I know when I've used PayPal for subscriptions in the past there has usually been an option to cancel the payment within PayPal directly, even if it wasn't available in the vendor site itself. Do you know if we can control this on our end or is that something out of our hands?

Cheers,

Casey

doTERRA Presidential Diamond | Author | 'Rebels of Light'

Ah! You can send me the video and I can do it. I've got passwords, but we just aim to keep them 'in house' if that makes sense. If you can show me what we need to do then that's awesome :)

Casey

doTERRA Presidential Diamond | Author | 'Rebels of Light'

Hi Casey, 

Yes, we will try and install Insta in a different manner to avoid that happening. If Tara is not keen to send over the password, I can send her a link and a video on how to login and authorise etc... It's just a little fiddly sometimes, so it tends to be cleaner when we have the logins. She can reset them once we have connected it to the site.

Hi Emma, 

Not at all, go for it!!

Heya Heath, Happy Fri-yay! A quick one for you (I hope). Is there any harm with me setting up tags and automations in Active Campaign that will be used when WooCommerce is a go? For example, we're launching a new online program which you know about. Automations I am looking to setup:
  • Abandon cart email
  • Payment fail email (is this necessary)?
  • Welcome email
  • And probably a few others that pertain the the campaign that I can't remember.
I can't think of a reason there would be a problem to start doing this within Active Campaign and then actually get Woo Commerce to add the tags on form submission once you've set it all up, but I wanted to check. Thanks, Em

Hi again Heath :)

Re: Instagram. My theory is that the connection is resetting every time Tara changes her password, but she wants to be able to do that whenever she pleases and not have to fiddle around with the site. Is there another plugin/widget that would work with the design that isn't as involved?

Casey

doTERRA Presidential Diamond | Author | 'Rebels of Light'

Thanks Heath!

I'm grabbing the IG password for you.

For the discussion box I think we might be better to look at an alternative route for that one as this isn't necessarily something we want to use long term. Perhaps swapping to LearnDash with a comments add on there would be easier?

Casey

doTERRA Presidential Diamond | Author | 'Rebels of Light'

Hi Casey, 

Thanks for your patience with this, that's great news about the Soundbytes. 

  • Regarding WooCommerce, yes, thats correct! 
  • Regarding the Discussion Box, we have been looking for an off the shelf solution, and there doesn't seem to be one that will play nicely with the site. Generally within WordPress there is one 'batch' of comments for each individual post. With the current format, we would need to build something quite bespoke to enable the users to comment on the individual sections. I can look into it further for you, my estimate would be 15-20hours of dev work. 
  • The instagram widget, that link is not working for us either. Can you send me the Instagram logins so we can connect it manually. 
There will be a small invoice for the extra WooCommerce work, we will tally it up, but currently sitting at approx 1 hr.

Hi Heath, Update on the Soundbytes footer pop-up - we're going to go with the link to a page as you suggested. I went to create a page for this and discovered we already had one on hand. Link is here: https://tarabliss.com.au/soundbytes-for-your-spirit/ Also just checking on other existing matters:
  • WooCommerce - how we are able to articulate the subscription. Is it correct to say "1 upfront payment upon registration, followed by recurring membership payments to be deducted every 3 consecutive months."
  • The discussion box under sections - are we able to execute on this or is there another solution we should be looking at to have community engagement in house?
  • The Instagram widget, what do I need to do to fix this?
And a new one:
  • On The Campfire sales page we're only going to be using a single panel on the price block. The way this was previously designed was that we could choose to have either one or two panels showing (Standard and then a bonus payment plan for example) But for some reason when I hide the second panel now it doesn't centre the remaining panel and instead keeps it to the left. There's no apparent option to change this on the front of it. Can you help?
Also just wanting to check where we are at currently with our dev hours tally. I know we only get a couple included each month - do you need to invoice us? Cheers, Casey BLISS SUPPORT e. support@tarabliss.com.au w. tarabliss.com.au Courage | Creation | Collaborative Leadership doTERRA Presidential Diamond | Author | 'Rebels of Light'

Hi Heath!

Thanks so much for checking that out with the Soundbytes. I wonder when the popup stopped working as that has been part of the design since it launched a couple years ago.

I'll check with the team but we can duplicate a page I'm sure pretty easily. I know we are looking to change the opt-in soon anyway.

Awesome re: the checkout too!

Did you get a chance to see what I'm missing with the Instagram widget? I looked through the old emails from Luke and what I had to do is below, though it wasn't working on my end and he had to do it on his for some reason.

1. Login to Insta as TB
2. Go to this link in your browser (now correct):
https://api.instagram.com/oauth/authorize/?client_id=4c1332cfb2824732af9dee0141c86fd9&redirect_uri=https://tarabliss.com.au&response_type=token
3. Grab the code at the end of #access_token= in the URL bar
4. In the CMS backend, go to Options > Social Media > Instagram and update the Auth Token field

Cheers!

Casey

doTERRA Presidential Diamond | Author | 'Rebels of Light'

Hi Casey, 

We found the issue on the Soundbytes form, click here to see and let me know your thoughts?
https://www.loom.com/share/9508b32f12e0468089e25bf56a32be09

Regarding the subscription/WooCommerce we had to make some amendments/allowances as the previous developer was using some of the WooCommerce functionality and it was causing conflicts. The good news is it's working! We can add this link: https://tarabliss.com.au/?add-to-cart=14425 to a buy/subscribe type button and the product is added to cart and you will be automatically redirected. We now just have to style the cart and checkout pages to match the website look and feel. 

I will be in touch once this is ready : )
